data.title: Deadly Game Movies - Arapahoe Libraries
data.meta_description: Deadly Game Movies by ArapahoeKayla - a staff-created list : Horror and thriller movies about deadly survival competitions that will leave you hearing the eerie phrase "Do you want to play a game?".
data.text:
42 kids, 1 deserted island, last to survive wins. This dystopian story of school children pitted against each other in a deadly competition is based on the novel that influenced an entire genre. 42 kids, 1 deserted island, last to survive wins. This dystopian story of school children pitted against each other in a deadly competition is based on the novel that influenced an entire genre. Show less

2 teens each from 13 districts, 1 reality filmed show, last to survive wins. The Hunger Games series based on books that can also be summarized as a "Battle Royale" story. 2 teens each from 13 districts, 1 reality filmed show, last to survive wins. The Hunger Games series based on books that can also be summarized as a "Battle Royale" story. Show less
